EmailTemplate.description: SF Temp Mobile Customers (questionnaire link – get started)
EmailTemplate.name: SF Temp Mobile Customers (questionnaire link – get started)
EmailTemplate.subject: LegalZoom.com: Getting Started On Your (LLC / Corp / NP)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for considering LegalZoom.com to help you with your business filing needs.
Per our discussion, I have provided the link below to get started on your LLC/Corp/NP questionnaire.
Also, as your personal Business Formations Specialist, please feel free to call me directly for any additional questions that you may have at 888-313-5686 x {!User.Extension}.
TO GET STARTED: (Click on the orange box) LLC: http://www.legalzoom.com/limited-liability-company/llc-overview.html Corp: https://www.legalzoom.com/legal-incorporation/incorporation-overview.html Non Profit: https://www.legalzoom.com/non-profits/non-profit-corporation-overview.html DBA: http://www.legalzoom.com/legal-dba/dba-doing-business-as-overview.html
I look forward to helping you,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} {!User.CompanyName} {!User.Address} {!User.Phone} ext. {!User.Extension}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
